Happy People: A Year in the Taiga

Ano: 2010

IMDb ID: tt1683876

Classificação: 7.7

Sinopse: In the center of the story is the life of the indigenous people of the village Bakhtia at the river Yenisei in the Siberian Taiga. The camera follows the protagonists in the village over a period of a year. The natives, whose daily routines have barely changed over the last centuries, keep living their lives according to their own cultural traditions. The expressive pictures are accompanied by original sound bites quoting the villagers.—Eike Wolf / Head of Corporate Communications, Studio Babelsberg
